Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.server.rmi

Class RMIServerImplementation

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.server.rmi.RMIServerImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServerImplementation extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerInterface
Implementation of the ServerInterface for RMI connections.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • RMIServerImplementation

      public RMIServerImplementation(RemoteClientInterface clientInterface, LobbyManager lobbyManager) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new object with which the client can communicate through the RMI protocol.
      Parameters:
      clientInterface - The interface of the client with which the server can respond and send data to the client.
      lobbyManager - The lobby manager that contains information about all active games on this server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Thrown if an error occurs while creating the remote object.

  • Method Details

    • pingRoutine

      private void pingRoutine()
      Pings the client to check if the connection is still alive. A client is disconnected if it doesn't answer to the ping within 10 seconds.

    • getGames

      public void getGames() throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ServerInterface
      Asks the server to send the list of active games, together with some basic information about them.
      Specified by:
      getGames in interface ServerInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while asking for the games.

      Creates a new game with the given number of players.

      Parameters:

    • leaveGame

      public void leaveGame(boolean forced) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ServerInterface
      Lets the player leave the game, disconnecting them.
      Specified by:
      leaveGame in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      forced - false if the client decided spontaneously to leave; true if the client is leaving because the server told it to do so.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while leaving the game.

    • pong

      public void pong() throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ServerInterface
      Pongs the server to confirm that the client is still active.
      Specified by:
      pong in interface ServerInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while sending the pong response to the server.
